author: Wesley LeBlanc
title: Fallout 76 Wastelanders DLC Delayed By a Week
description: Bethesda has delayed the upcoming Fallout 76 Wastelanders update by a week.
content: Fallout 76's upcoming Wastelanders DLC has been delayed by a week.Bethesda announced the Wastelanders DLC during their 2019 E3 conference, and called it the "biggest update yet" that will bring human NPCs with full dialogue trees, a new main quest, choice and… [+1668 chars]
